question: How many hours of daylight does Uppsala, Sweden receive during the summer solstice?
asked_question_translated: Berapa jam cahaya matahari yang diterima Uppsala, Swedia selama titik balik matahari musim panas?
answer: Uppsala, Swedia menerima sekitar 18-19 jam cahaya matahari selama titik balik matahari musim panas.
answer_translated_eng: Uppsala, Sweden receives about 18-19 hours of sunlight during the summer solstice.
